DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to observe the tolerability and effectiveness of Kaletra in Human Immunodeficiency Virus/Hepatitis-B Virus and Human Immunodeficiency Virus/Hepatitis-C Virus co-infected patients.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Effectiveness and Safety in Hepatitis-co-infected Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients infected by HIV1 and HBV or HCV Age â‰¥18 years Patients who were initiated on a LPV/r containing antiretroviral (ARV) regimen Contraindications as described in SmPC (summary of product characteristics) at the time of prescription
DOC.keyword: Co-infection with Hepatitis B or Hepatitis C
